website_summaries.verdict: Reflective striping makes this coat a good choice if you regularly walk your dog in the dark.
pros: Self-adjusting belly strap for a secure and comfortable fit
Vibrant yellow with reflective stripes helps ensure your dog will be seen
Available in a variety of sizes
Measure from base of the neck to the base of the tail for sizing
cons: Order a size up if your pet is within 1" of the maximum, or if your pet has a broad chest, bulky build, or thick coat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Pygmy goat
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I needed a reflective rain coat for my pygmy goat but was worried about sizing. I chose a Medium based on dog breeds his size. I love that it has Velcro across the chest and stomach. Great material too! Such a good value. I definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Howard

customer_reviews.title: We like the raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I have a 40lb goldendoodle who has a 23" body length and 25" chest girth. Size XL fits him quite well. The coat can cover his whole body when the hood is on his head. We both like this raincoat. I will upload three pictures of my dog in his raincoat, so you can see how the coat looks on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: E. Huang

customer_reviews.title: Sunshine in the Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Love these raincoats. Ordered three altogether. They are tough, cute, and keep my dogs dry. I have purchased other flimsy raincoats that did not keep my dogs dry. I am extremely pleased with these. The little hoods are cute too. The purpose of the raincoats are so that I only have to dry off their feet when they return from their walk. These sturdy little coats are great. And my furry kids seem to like them and and they stay in place without slipping and sliding. Fantastic price for great product. Awesome! :-)
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: A waste of time & money
customer_reviews.text: The sizing chart called for a small size which is supposed to fit a neck to tail measurement of 10 to 14 inches. The small I got is 9 inches long; leaving the rear part of my dog completely in the rain. The measurement for the section that is supposed to cover her belly is also much too small for my dog's girth of 16". The inside has no lining and each seam is quite sharp. This item will be returned!
customer_reviews.author: Dorie

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Usefull
customer_reviews.text: My 12lb Shih Tzu wears this in a M. It keeps him dry and looks adorable with the little hood folded slightly back so he can see, it keeps his head dry the length covers his entire back. His girth is 16" his back is 14" it is large in the girth area on him, but I was more concerned with the length to keep him dry. The waist (girth) strap hangs a little due to me cinching it tight because it is loose no big deal. I normally put it on over his padded vest anyway. My boy enjoys wearing all his rain gear. Its easy on easy off.
customer_reviews.author: MunchyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and not at all functional
customer_reviews.text: This slicker looked so cute when I opened the package I was excited to put it on my dog and go for a walk in slushy conditions. But I found out the velcro closure in the front is a stupid idea. The dog's walking motion simply tears it open. And while the hood looks cute, there's no way it would actually function by staying on your dog's head without some kind of tie around it. A design that works for people doesn't necessarily function on a walking dog. When we got home from our first walk using this slicker, we stopped by the garbage to toss it.
customer_reviews.author: Shauronna

customer_reviews.title: Great little raincoat-be careful with sizing
customer_reviews.text: I love the raincoat. Great style. I have a shih tzu who is 12 pounds and 15 inches long. I read the the other reviews and comments and went with the medium to be sure it was long enough. Big mistake. It was more than long enough but the unde strap was sooooo long that I could wrap it around more once. It went way past the Velcro so I couldn't secure it. He was swimming in it. It would probably work well on a bigger chested dog. I ordered a small and it is only a teeny it short in the length but otherwise perfect. He has a lot of thich hair and really helps keep him dry.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Fits a Frenchie
customer_reviews.text: Bought a medium for my 1year old frenchie. Easy to put on and covers her well except for her belly (around 2inches). I use a waterproof harness over it to keep it in place. She can do her business with it on. Should have bought her the large as she's now 2 y.o. and 22lbs. Medium doesn't fit her anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Ana

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great little rain coat
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great little rain coat. I think it works just fine. This is Jack. the coat is really easy to put on him, and he wears it like a trooper. It might be a little big but I like it that way it covers more of him as he walks around. I've started folding down the hat so he can see where he is going. But this is a great buy. We got him the Large, and he's about 25 pounds and a long legged Jack, And yes he's so cute!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: It is cute
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small and it is a little big for my 7 pound Yorkie but most raincoats aren't made to fit so it works. He doesn't like the hood so I am not sure we will get much use out of that part of it. At least he will stay partially dry when he goes out in the rain. There is a little slit in the back for his leash to go thru - it is in the perfect spot for his harness.
customer_reviews.author: KellyB

customer_reviews.title: Belly strap gets peed on
customer_reviews.text: The belly strap is too close to my dogs pee area and it even covers that area during the walk, I will cut off belly strap and move up so it fits better by sewing in a better placement for a male dog, I ordered medium for my 18lb maltipoo, fits except for the belly strap is in wrong place and it could use more velcro in belly wrap too because material hangs, If I would have purchased a small it would have been too small, also the back length doesn't full cover that area on top. The hood is too big so I will have to sew the hood back slightly inwards.
customer_reviews.author: Ajoneil

customer_reviews.title: Does it's job.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a size small for my 5.5 pound pomchi. I went by the back length measurements. The back length fit perfect, but the belly strap was over double the length of what it should be. Easy enough fix, I just cut and sewed the strap to size. Just took it for a test drive and it stayed put just fine and kept the rain at bay. This would be good for spring or fall showers, but not winter, seeing as it is very lightweight. You could layer it over a sweater for warmth. Overall, for the price, I can't complain. Just be prepared to make a few alterations and definitely go by the back length measurements.
customer_reviews.author: jademarie

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart is off
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a medium based on the sizing chart and the reviews listed but it was way too big, we could have wrapped it around her body twice (the length worked perfectly), we had to return and order a Small. We have a long and skinny pup so even the small is a bit big in the belly but short on length, however an extra small would have the majority of her back hanging out - defeating the purpose. It will make due for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Leah F

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality velcro makes it ineffective
customer_reviews.text: My dog hates the rain with a passion. I thought this would be a good solution. Maybe it's not the right size because she is a weirdly shaped dog, but it flops over her eyes and constantly opens in the chest area. It looks like she is floating because it comes down to the ground and hides her legs. I've been meaning to find another raincoat, but I do break this out in an emergency like a downpour because it does cover her for a quick run to the covered potty area. Make sure you measure and are willing to deal with making adjustments before you buy this raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is on the generous side
customer_reviews.text: Overall, I like this raincoat with the extra material in front to allow the dog to run but the sizing is quite generous. I'll need to get the sewing machine out to tailor this to my Corgi, Beagle, Dachshund mix with his long spine and short legs. I do like the school bus yellow color. Other pet stores carrying similar item was way more money than I wanted to spend. This is cuter than anything I've seen before.
customer_reviews.author: MagSam

customer_reviews.title: Order a size up to fit your dog.
customer_reviews.text: The product was too small for my dog. I measured my beagle from neck to base of tail. Also around the middle and he sized a medium. The raincoat was too small to go around to fasten and the hood was too short to reach his head. My beagle is not over weight and from a champion breed. I threw away the information or I would have sent it back. It is brand new folded up in a cabinet.
customer_reviews.author: NanSh

customer_reviews.title: Limited coverage
customer_reviews.text: Was way too small. The size I bought was for the 10"-14" back length. My dog is 12" but it didn't even cover half of him and it's really tight around his middle. So disappointing. What good is a raincoat if it only covers half? So...we go for a walk and my dog is wet, but hey, at least 6 inches on his back is dry! (what??). So dumb. And it's not returnable so I'm stuck with a dog raincoat that I can't use. Compete waste.
customer_reviews.author: StephBia

customer_reviews.title: Fell apart on first use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in a small and a large for my two dogs. Both jackets immediately split up the hood the first time the dogs wore them. The small opening for the leash is not reinforced properly to prevent this kind of tearing. Additionally, the velco around the mid section is not strong enough. When my dogs shake, the jackets pop right open. This weakness also allows the jacket to slouch from side to side and cover my dogs' eyes. Since the hoods are too long to begin with, I already have to fold them back so they don't cover their eyes completely. Overall, disproportionate and cheap materials.
customer_reviews.author: Leah Hanley

customer_reviews.title: Cute raincoat
customer_reviews.text: Everyone was posting that this item fit small. My 12 pound pug always wears a size small in everything. According to all of the other reviews they said to buy up a size so I purchased a medium. I shouldn’t have done that. It fits for the picture that I wanted for an it theme. But it is not practical for walks because it covers his penis and he’ll pee on it. It also goes the whole way ove his tail. I would’ve been better off getting the small. Maybe he’ll have a growth spurt 😂
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Adorable and Functional
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is perfect for what we needed. My dog is a little bit of a diva about going out in the rain but is high energy so rain or shine we need to get in a walk. He loves the rain coat since he doesn't get wet and can enjoy being outside. He is a mix, so his proportions are a little off, hes about 14# but the velcro band that goes around his underside was too wide and covered his privates so he couldn't pee properly. Ended up just cutting that band down and now it works perfect. Great for the price. Plus everyone thinks hes adorable in it.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney C.

customer_reviews.title: Sizing could be better
customer_reviews.text: Overall this raincoat is "better than nothing." I really wanted to like it. But as many buyers have noted, the sizing is maddening and makes the product barely useful. If you choose the sizing based on your dog's chest & girth, you end up with a coat that is too short and will leave half of the dog's body uncovered. But if you choose the sizing based on the dog's length (as I did, purchasing a medium for my dog with a 16" body) , you will get a coat that is too big around the chest area, even with the adjustable velcro strap. Why can't the manufacturer make a small or extra-small size that has a longer body length??
customer_reviews.author: cuteynfatal

customer_reviews.title: When in doubt size up
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these in Small (which my dog normally is) but had to exchange it for a Medium. The medium fits his neck well but just barely fits his waist. Of course, every dog is shaped differently so measure carefully and when in doubt go a size larger (since it can be tightened a bit further than it can be loosened" Otherwise decent quality, pretty functional in love the bright and reflective design. The "hoodie" is a little silly though, it will never stay on any dog's head lol.
customer_reviews.author: Bugalydosh

customer_reviews.title: Check your measurements and order accordingly.  These run small if you go by general sizing.
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love their outdoor times, especially going for walks however, when it rains, they balk. These have been wonderful with getting them out to enjoy walks despite the weather. Going by usual sizing, these would run small. Check your measurements and order accordingly. The L fits my medium Mountain Cur like a glove. My Chicago Brown Dog (Rottweiler-mix) generally wears a large but according to the size chart, I ordered the XL. It’s a little big, but is adjustable so that it doesn’t slip too much. Bonus is that they look adorable in them!
customer_reviews.author: Jinxie

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your dog drier
customer_reviews.text: I have long haired dogs that soak up rain like sponges. They are 25 and 29 pounds, but the hair takes up a lot of room. I ordered the size Large for both. I probably could have gone with an XL for the 29 pound dog, but Large works. Their tails aren't covered but they stay pretty dry. These raincoats have made drying off a lot quicker after they've been out in the yard for bathroom visits on rainy days - pretty much just legs and feet. I don't dress my dogs in clothes, but I consider these raincoats to be practical and a timesaver for me.
customer_reviews.author: MySnow

customer_reviews.title: Just the cutest little thing out there for any dogs
customer_reviews.text: This is just the cutest little rain coat for my dog. Even though she is not fond of it - or basically she is not fond whenever I put something over her back - but it definitely does the job. It protects her body in the rain (not her head because she doesn't like anything covering her head). But at the very least, her body will be less wet when it rains, and she can be outside longer than she is supposed to be when it's raining. Someone even commedted and said she looks like Paddington bear!
customer_reviews.author: LLD

customer_reviews.title: Just Plain WRONG Sizing!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I measured very carefully twice...and read the review for this adorable jacket. Medium Size runs very small. My 20 pound 9 month old westie didn't fit in the medium at all. Our neighbors 14 lb dog barely fit. Next I ordered the Large Size...it is way over the claimed 4 inches larger. My dog walked out of it. I am so dissapointed.
customer_reviews.author: Alecks

customer_reviews.title: Good size and color, but the hood is too small
customer_reviews.text: This fits my 10-pound terrier/chihuahua mix fairly well with the adjustable Velcro, but the hood will not stay over his head when he walks. It keeps his body fairly dry and easy to see in the dark and rain. An improvement would be to make the hood bigger and maybe line the inside to keep the dog warm, too. Now, I just need to find some matching rain boots and an umbrella, and my pup will be ready for our Seattle weather!
customer_reviews.author: FlitzerMama

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Slicker!
customer_reviews.text: Just received this yellow dog slicker/raincoat for my pug.. Tried it out yesterday evening for the first time as it was raining here in Ohio. The quality of it seems very durable yet lightweight too. It's not cumbersome like some coats are. She doesn't mind it at all. It fits her perfectly & is adjustable. She's not crazy about the hood over her hear, but I just tucked it inside. Perfectly waterproof. She wasn't wet at all other than her feet when we returned home. I know we'll have a long time to use this & I'm sure it'll hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Sherrydeg

customer_reviews.title: Leash pass through ripped the first time out
customer_reviews.text: This jacket looked like it was well made, but the leash pass through ripped far and wide the first time out for a walk. My Labrador has a large chest and lean abdomen/tummy. There is only 1 strap which did not work out nicely. It needs another strap but that would get in the way for male dogs if you know what I mean. If your dog is shaped like a sausage, then it would work better. As it is, very disappointed and could not recommend for a dog with a large chest and lean abdomen.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. & Mrs. Science lover

customer_reviews.title: Not a good fit.
customer_reviews.text: Based on reviews and previously purchase. I purchased a large for my dog who is 20lbs and 17 inch body length. It was really big at least it did cover his back side. Made a lot of adjustment. The middle part with Velcro hits his legs and rubs against other sensitive parts. I then purchased a medium, for my 15lbs shorkie and 17 inch for body length, which was short and the hat fits big. Also the middle part to big and wide rubbing under sensitivity body parts. Both size required adding velcro, to make smaller to wrap around the body with other adjustments.
customer_reviews.author: moya

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the rain off her back
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our Border Terrier mix a few months back, but only recently used it for the first time. We went out in a light rain and it was perfect with one exception. The hood covered her eyes as it was just a tad too large. She's a small to medium sized dog, about 30 pounds. I simply folder the front of the hood under and then she could see. In the end, her head was wet, as were her legs and tail. The legs was no due to the raincoat, but rather her penchant for going into the grass, despite it being wet. :-) All in all, I do recommend this rain jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Boots

customer_reviews.title: Inaccurate sizing chart
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the small for my 11 pound pup. I measured his back to be roughly 14 inches and decided on the small since his chest and body are very small. When the coat arrived, it seemed good quality, but the sizing was way off. The chart says a small fits a 10 - 14 inch long dog specifically from neck to bottom, but the coat was only 9 inches long from collar to end. Therefore, it did not cover his back nearly enough. Now, I have to wait for a return to process then reorder in the medium and wait for it to arrive and hope it will fit.. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Size chart is off
customer_reviews.text: Going by the size chart our dog should have take a medium, way wrong!!! It was extremely too big for him. Maybe a small or XS would have fit but definitely not a medium. The material is a heavier weight which is probably going to serve better for a colder rain than we get here in the south . Now it is a nice material definitely will not tear easy and it did seem as if it would be water resistant although we were unable to try that
customer_reviews.author: lori costa

customer_reviews.title: Going back to Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Way too short. X-small should have fit my Maltese. I measured her from her collar to the top of her tail. 10". With the hood up, the coat hardly made it down half her back. And if I were to go up a size she would be lost in the width (which was fine for her 8lbs).
customer_reviews.author: Suki

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit my dog at all
customer_reviews.text: Despite following the size chart, this didn't even come close to fitting my dog, waayyyyy too small. The size chart only lists the length of the dog, which does not take into account the chest size which is really the only size that matters when you're sizing a dog for clothing.
customer_reviews.author: MotoRobot

customer_reviews.title: Look great but the fit is off.
customer_reviews.text: May 2019: These raincoats arrived quickly and looked just like the pictures. My dogs looked super cute in them but unfortunately they did not fit well enough to stay on while we walked even though I measured the pups and then ordered one size larger as the reviews suggested. Once we began walking the velcro would pull loose. On a positive note, the seller was quick to accept my return and refund my money.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Works great - double-check sizing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Brittany Spaniel. She hates the rain, and taking her out when it is coming down has proven to be nearly impossible. She's not used to wearing clothes, so she's a little awkward in it, but it works just fine. For your reference: She's about 37 pounds, and I bought a large. I originally bought a medium, but it was too small for my girl.
customer_reviews.author: AHou

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is really important!  I thought my dog would've been smaller in size....
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is really important! I have a 44LB Boykin Spaniel. He is refereed to as a medium dog, approx 23 Inches long from neck to end of tail. I order the XL size based on reading the sizing provided by Manufacturer. The XL fits my perfectly! I love the jacket and would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Scottish

customer_reviews.title: No harness loop cover.
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had a chance to test it fully , but it did a nice job in the sprinkle this evening. The material is really good quality and the 3M works well. Only issue is there was no cover for the harness loop hole, its completely open and almost defeats the purpose of the raincoat. I have a 2 yrs old peekapoo. Hes about 12lbs and he fits the small perfect, I could even go up a size.
customer_reviews.author: toshai porter

customer_reviews.title: Great Sturdy Material! Ordered size XL
customer_reviews.text: For roughly $10 this raincoat is surprisingly sturdy. The material feels great. It’s thick and actually feels expensive. It’s easy to put on my dog and the reflectors make it so easy to see him at night. I got the XL because the previous reviews said the coat ran small, but it covers my dogs entire body. He is really fussy about getting wet so it’s absolutaly perfect when we go walking and it’s a little rainy out. I was pleasantly surprised with this product. I love it and so does my terrier/hound. If you’re on a budget and worries about the material being cheap, it’s not. I think the coat is durable and affordable.
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: This is a great raincoat for our little dog
customer_reviews.text: This is a great raincoat for our little dog. He doesn't mind wearing it and it keeps most of him dry. I measured from his neck to tail and ordered the size recommended. It's the right length, but I had to fold back the hood because it covered his eyes. I also had to fold and tape the front part that drapes in front of his short legs because he kept stepping on it. It was just a little long for his short legs. After making those modifications, it's a great fit. I love the Velcro fasteners too. Easy to put on and take off.
customer_reviews.author: D. Weiskircher

customer_reviews.title: That means a lot of hair and it can get matted really easy. I bought this and it keeps his back ...
customer_reviews.text: I have a Labradoodle. That means a lot of hair and it can get matted really easy. I bought this and it keeps his back and neck pretty dry. The hood is too big and covers his eyes so I fold it under. I wish it had ELASTIC to go around the front legs to keep the raincoat from turning from side to side. Overall, for the price it is pretty good. My dog is 25lbs, and I would consider him a medium dog and I ended up buying him a large. I tried the medium and it was too small.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: Nice raincoat but measure carefully, then go up one size.
customer_reviews.text: I have boughten this rain coat before for gifts for my friends little dogs. But now I wanted one for my new dog, and measured her and ordered according to the chart. I recommend you go up one size as I just received mine and it is too small and I will have to make due before ordering again. Plus since I ordered 3/4 days ago the price went up $1. It’s worth the money, but the size chart is definately off.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara Bain

customer_reviews.title: Cute but too small for my guy
customer_reviews.text: This coat is too cute and seems made well enough for the cost! I ordered a XXL for my golden retriever because he had multiple lumps removed and we need to keep stitches dry. Unfortunately, while it fit length wise, it would not close around his chest area. I wish they provided more measurements. For reference or anyone else trying to figure out if it will fit. My guys chest is 36" and the straps barely touched under his belly. I would say that it would fit no larger than a 30-32" chest measurement comfortably. Sad I had to return this!
customer_reviews.author: K. Heller

customer_reviews.title: Good quality overall
customer_reviews.text: Ordered 1 size up and it fit my 7mo. old 80lb large Labradoodle Pup. We had a rainy day so we gave it a try yesterday. We put it on Boomer first thing in the morning it fit well and the overall quality was good so we had high hopes it would last. One hour after putting on the rain coat he had shredded it into tiny pieces. so much for unsupervised rain gear. Perhaps if it was made of heavy canvas it might have made it through the day. Good product slightly crazy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Bridge Riff

customer_reviews.title: Well made rain coat.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really nice rain coat. It is well made. I ordered a large for my Bichon Frise, unfortunately it was way too big. I couldn't find a size chart on the Amazon page where it was displayed. I saw another rain coat just like it from another seller so I'm sure I got the size from there. My Bella was between sizes so I went up a size as was suggested. The large was way too big so I had to return it. The return process was unbelievably easy. I will order a medium from the same seller. I would recommend this rain coat for all the fur babies.
customer_reviews.author: efuaampa

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to measure for the length so you get the correct size. I still haven't found the measurements online.
customer_reviews.text: This coat is so cute but I never found the dimensions when I placed my order. My dog is a puppy so I will have to get another one soon. The dimensions are on the coat and the length I ordered is a little short. There is a place for the leash below the hood and the 2nd time I used it, it came unsown.. It was easily fixed if you have a needle and thread. When she grows, I will get another one and will know how to measure for a new one. It is really cute. When she is grown, it may not come large enough as she will be a fairly large dog.
customer_reviews.author: Etonna L. Mcdade

customer_reviews.title: HOW DRY I AM!
customer_reviews.text: My little Chi loves his new raincoat, and so do I. We live in Florida and for far too long we are in the Rainy Season. Nico weighs 13 pounds and the new rain coat fits, and even if Nico gains a pound or two, his new rain gear will Be fine. Nico will not go out in the rain without his protection, and, I must say, he looks very handsome and catches the eyes of many female chihuahuas!
customer_reviews.author: Ellen J. Coryat

customer_reviews.title: Not for us
customer_reviews.text: Followed the sizing guide and this ended up being way too large. I like that it has a Velcro chest and Velcro underneath the stomach. However since it was too large, I know the back Velcro piece might get in the way when my dog pees. The hood also did not reach his head. Very thin material, could read the tag from underneath. So not sure how water resistant it would be over time.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Ripped with first wearing.
customer_reviews.text: This is so adorable on my westie, and a perfect fit except the waist belt could have been a little more narrow to accommodate his shorter body. I put the leash on through the collar hole and at the first squirrel sighting it ripped a big slit up the hood. I tried duct tape, but it was a loss after the Fi st wearing. That’s the reason for the low rating.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie from Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: ... delivery time on this item was fast which was great. I measured my dog and decided that the ...
customer_reviews.text: The delivery time on this item was fast which was great. I measured my dog and decided that the medium would be the best fit. It works fine for my dog in terms of length but it was a bit tight around his neck. Also, the width of his chest suggested that medium would be the best size but it’s a bit big, but if I would’ve bought the small I don’t think that it would’ve fit around his neck. The opening along the back is perfect for wearing his harness underneath the raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Harris

customer_reviews.title: Cute and dry!
customer_reviews.text: Love this coat! Wish the waist of it was a little smaller though. My dog is 12” from base of neck to base of tail, but chose a size medium due to other reviews. My shorty Jack Russell is only 9” at the shoulder so the front skirt is a little long on her. Maybe a small would have fit her a little better, but we have room to put another coat underneath for warmth. The attached picture is without another coat under the raincoat.
customer_reviews.author: mamajojo

customer_reviews.title: Not for short dogs
customer_reviews.text: My little doxie kept stepping on the front of it and biffing it. (I know, it sounds funny, but not funny if you're the one walking him in the rain. I cut it to see if it would help, but by then the little guy had decided he'd had enough and wouldn't even try to walk with it on. Can't blame him.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, fit great
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase I made, bought 3, 2 x-large for my 65 pound mix breeds, 1- medium for my 16 pound jack Russell. They fit great, had serval rain storms here in florida, no more wet dogs, kept them all dry. Had to cut off hoods on 2 of them because that freaked them out but my other dog pranced around with her head covered.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous 11

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but runs big.
customer_reviews.text: It’s cute, but a bit big in girth. I bought it for my 19” chested, 16.5-lb. Shihpoo, who is 14” long from base of neck to tail. The velcro strap under the belly area is really long. I could probably cut it in half for a better fit to prevent the jacket from sliding sideways when he walks. My dog also loathes the hoodie, so I basically fold it within itself and use it as a high collar. I think a small would be too short for him, or else I would have considered returning it. But it does its job and I love the harness opening and design.
customer_reviews.author: Steph in DC

customer_reviews.title: Sizing waaay off
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is super cute and seems like it would do a good job but i couldn't say for sure because the sizing is so off. I measured my dog as advised and originally purchased the medium. The medium turned out to be too small so i returned it and got the large. The large is also too small but I've basically now given up. My dog is 45lb and is a border collie mix, so basically a close to a "regular" shape that you can have for a dog. The large barely closes around him and about 6" of his back is left uncovered
customer_reviews.author: AnnaHowardShaw

customer_reviews.title: XL fits my dog perfect. my dog is a female
customer_reviews.text: XL fits my dog perfect. my dog is a female, legs 10", neck to tail 23", chest 30". none of other reviewers gave any real measurements of their dog, so the chart is useless.. fits my dog perfect means nothing if you don't know the dog's measurements. hope this helps next buyer. btw, don't know how well it will hold up for use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer cjpinnell

customer_reviews.title: Good rain protection
customer_reviews.text: However, I will need to move the under-the-chest strap further toward the rear and shorten it so it fits my long and thin dog. Ordered 2 of these - larger one that fits the dog's length is too large around the chest. Smaller one does not fit the full length of the dog. Glued the visors so they no longer cover the dogs' eyes.
customer_reviews.author: doctor don

customer_reviews.title: Mini Raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I apparently ordered the wrong size. I already had a raincoat for my doxie, but it was too short. It looked as if this one suppposed made for doxies would be longer so I ordered a small. It is not as long as the other one that I already had. But it appeared that a medium would be too big. doxies are long but thin. The quality appears to be good. It just isn't long enough to cover her back.
customer_reviews.author: jean miller

customer_reviews.title: Torso size didn't work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: My problem was the torso size. I checked the sizing chart and ordered but torse didn't work and also around the neck was too small. the fabric is very basic, so it may tear one day. No lining. Size didn't work so I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: CTmom

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is sketchy
customer_reviews.text: I have a 25 lb Mini Goldendoodle, so I suppose a medium should have fit, but based on others' reviews, I ordered a large because I wanted the raincoat to cover up to the tail. The length of the large is perfect, but it is way too big around the waist and neck, so I had to alter the raincoat myself to fit. If I ordered a medium, it probably would have fit better but would have been way too short in the back.
customer_reviews.author: A Doc

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: The hood would not go over my dogs head and the front Velcro on the chest kept coming undone. When we got back in in from our walk in the rain, the only thing keeping the little rain jacket on the dog was the hole the harness came through.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: he happily went outside despite the rain
customer_reviews.text: It's cute, and every time I put it on my dog it brings a smile to my face. It doesn't rain very often where I live so we haven't had enough chances to test it out. When I put it on him last night for a quick outing in the rain, I found that my dog hates the hood so much that he didn't want to go out! when I took the rain slicker off of him, he happily went outside despite the rain. I also dislike the fact that it doesn't fully cover his backside. I would love to return it but I'm past the time to return from when I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Terri

customer_reviews.title: Keeps the Rain of!
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is great. I like that it has the stripe for visibility. And the material is traditional rain slicker matte material. The hood tends to drop in front of my dog's eyes and block his vision but it fits well around his chest and neck. I got the medium for my dog who is a 17 lb yorkipoo mix. It's been a very rainy SoCal winter so I am glad I finally took the plunge.
customer_reviews.author: cwilliams

customer_reviews.title: Great coat, easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves her new raincoat. She's a 55lb sharpei/ golden mix, im glad i got the larger size for her to cover her more. It took her a bit to get used to it but now that she knows she gets to go out on walks in the rain she's happy to put it on. I pull the hood back unless its raining heavy so she can see better. The only downfall is it doesn't cover her tail or the underside much but it doesn't keep the majority of her long fur nice and dry! Great material too and the color is excellent for cars to see in the dark.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: This thing is adorable! Sizing is a little funky where the small ...
customer_reviews.text: 3.5 stars. This thing is adorable! Sizing is a little funky where the small fits my 14-lb terrier really perfect in the chest/neck but is a bit too short. Better too short than too long I guess. The one thing I would recommend to the brand is that rain/snow (the wet ground) makes the arms and stomach of my dog so wet and dirty. It would be ideal if the product covered more of the stomach area to shield from splashing water on the ground.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice little rain coat for doggie outings
customer_reviews.text: I like the functioning of the jacket, but the back is a little short for my dog. I bought a medium for my(20 #) mini aussie and its about 5-6 in too short on his back. I tried the large my son bought and it was way too big. I only use it for outside potty trips and it keeps him dry except last 1/3 of his back. It's a great little dog coat for rain, just needs to be longer backed. My son's large works good on his Pom who is a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to Measure as directed
customer_reviews.text: All I can say is go by the measurements. My pup is About 55lbs not big to me. But according to the measurements he is an XL. So that’s what I ordered and it fit perfectly. He’s a little squirmy when it comes to putting anything on him. This was fairly easy to get on. I believe he will keep him dry if we can get him to keep it on. Haven’t had a chance to wear it outside but we will soon.
customer_reviews.author: Love shopping

customer_reviews.title: High quality but be careful with sizing!
customer_reviews.text: I love this raincoat.... The quality is awesome however the sizing is off. I bought it for 2 Bichons 10 & 15 lbs and the small is way too small & the medium is just too big! If you have a smaller dog or a bit bigger dog then theses are perfect! I wish they were true to size because they are really well made!
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: My dog looks so adorable in her new rain slicker
customer_reviews.text: I just received my dogs rain jacket. She's not to happy with it but she looks darn cute in it. Even her daddy got a good chucle out of seeing her in it. I will probably order another one for when we travel in our RV. I do wish it came in another color besides bright yellow. I am happy with the purchase. I will order another one or something close to it. Thanks Ethical products.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy M

customer_reviews.title: Horrible sizing
customer_reviews.text: I ended up buying this twice in two different sizes. I followed the size guide and bought an XL for my pitbull. It arrived and it was HUGE on him. So big he keeps tripping on it. So I went back and ordered a L. Now it’s too small and won’t close.
customer_reviews.author: Daniela

customer_reviews.title: Ultimately disappointed. Length of Medium ~12 in.
customer_reviews.text: It is just okay because, as you can see from many of the reviews, the sizing and size chart is off. If a medium is for a 14-19 inch dog (as is tells you to measure), why is this part of the coat only 12.5 inches when it arrives? That makes absolutely no sense. I was excited to get this, but ultimately disappointed. My sheltie is 13" at the shoulder, weighs 16 lbs and measures 16" from base of neck to start of tail and the medium leaves a good bit of her back exposed (approx. 4 inches)
customer_reviews.author: K. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality for Reasonable Price!!
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is a little long in front for my dachshund puppy but other than that it's a great coat that does a good job of keeping his long hair dry. Unlike the other dachshunds I've had, Sandy likes to sit out in the rain so he would get soaking wet before we got the coat. He was a little skeptical at first (right picture) but now it's no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Lady Pat

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, stays on, fits length well
customer_reviews.text: I followed commentor's sizing recommendations when ordering. Overall, very happy with this. It is super easy to put on. It's as easy to take off as it is to put on. It fits her length well (a bit loose around the midsection, but eh.) The hood doesn't really stay on, but do any coats/hoodies for dogs actually have hoods that stay on? It does what it needs to do to keep most of her body dry. And she's stinkin' cute in it.
customer_reviews.author: Lilyn G.

customer_reviews.title: Well Made!
customer_reviews.text: This is the third of this rain coat we’ve purchased (for three separate dogs) because we love it! It fits our current dog, a miniature American Eskimo, perfectly. She’s fluffy and stout, but only about 13 lbs. It fits her well. This cost is nice and thick and is well made.
customer_reviews.author: carolynjbraden

customer_reviews.title: Neck is too narrow for Frenchie puppy
customer_reviews.text: Good value and really cute but not a good fit for my puppy. Medium is too tight around the neck for my 5 month French Bulldog puppy. The velco is about 1 inch wide so it is not really adjustable at the neck. The vinyl is a little thinner than higher price jackets but seems durable enough for a growing puppy that won't be wear it more than one to two seasons.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: So I ordered a small for my 10lbs Morkie and it was way too small, it barely cover her. A Medium would have been better but I don’t like how it also moved as she was walking. The hood also kept covering her face and she couldn’t see, if I moved it then her whole head would get wet. Her hair grows fast and it has no covereage under the belly area. The idea is good, and for a less hairy dog maybe it works, but not for hairy breeds. All her 4 legs, belly and head were soaked wet! I’ll keep looking for a new rain jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Alessandromvsp

customer_reviews.title: Great jacket but didn’t work for my dog
customer_reviews.text: Great rain jacket but the hat seems a little too large for my Boston terrier. If I’m not careful to tuck it under, my dog flips out and starts going in circles because she can’t see. We put on a great show in the rain for the passing traffic, I was so embarrassed for my sweet pup! Perhaps this jacket might be better suited for a longer nosed dog...
customer_reviews.author: MRey

customer_reviews.title: Works as Expected and Stylish Too
customer_reviews.text: This rain jacket is adorable and fits my dog perfectly. The hood is a little awkward for him but it is probably more because he is not used to wearing a hood than any defect with the jacket. Easy velcro closure around the stomach makes taking it on and off a breeze and now my finicky dog isn't as freaked out about going to do his business in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: kb0337

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: Since it rains constantly where I live, I thought this would be a good buy. I read the other reviews about the belt/strap thing covering the dog's penis and ignored it. Big mistake. The strap is just so wide that it can't do anything other than cover the dog's genitals. What on earth is the point of a raincoat if it's "raining" inside it?! Returns with prime were easy, but do yourself a favor and just don't get it in the first place.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Rain Slicker
customer_reviews.text: This was an awesome rain slicker! Our puppy is about 20lbs and this fit perfect with room to grow some. It'll get us through the rest of the winter easy. It must be comfortable, cause she surprisingly enough, didn't try and take it right off after we tried it on her. This is a game changer; we were able to do our normal morning walk in a pretty good rain the other day. I think her slicker worked better than mine ;)
customer_reviews.author: Soulcalsurfer

customer_reviews.title: Belly strap too far back
customer_reviews.text: Love the styling and quality of the materials. However, the belly strap is in the wrong place...for any dog. It is way too far back and interferes with male dogs being able to urinate. The strap needs to be moved up closer to the dogs front legs. I purchased 3 coats for three different types of dogs and it was the same issue on all three. Because I know how to sew, I will remove the strap and move it forward for proper fit. Also, the velcro should be a longer strip for more adjustability. If the dog in the picture was standing instead of sitting...it would be obvious.
customer_reviews.author: Mike R

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is weird, but very effective raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I wish there was a size in between small and medium because the small is too small and the medium is too large and the extra material hangs over and drags on the ground. I have to trim it and compromise the look of the product. It does, however, keep my 15 lb Yorkshire Terrier dry.
customer_reviews.author: mook

customer_reviews.title: Love love love this raincoat
customer_reviews.text: I have a 30-pound lab/beagle mix with a super long body and short stubby legs, and went with a size L. This raincoat is great -- covers her all the way up to her tail, and hangs low enough that her chest and legs are reasonably protected. The hood stays up surprisingly well too. I did have to add some extra velcro to the sides so that I could fasten it a little bit tighter around her middle, but it would have worked even if I hadn't, and in terms of length it couldn't be better. My only real issue is that she keeps almost causing car accidents as people stop to stare at her jauntily skipping through puddles.
customer_reviews.author: Em

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small
customer_reviews.text: Even though I measured my dog and ordered the correct size, it still runs small in the chest and length. It does not velcro correctly in the chest/neck because it is just to small. I like the style but it does not fit my dog correctly. The material is good but a little thin. Not sure it will last very long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: awkward and uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love the color and ease of putting this on my puppy but he HATED it and refused to walk when wearing it. We made it as far as the first patch of wet grass where he chose to lay down and roll around until I slid the hood back. That helped for about 10 feet. Ultimately he won and the jacket came off. When it is raining out, it is too hard to motivate for a walk. This particular jacket did not make the walk any easier. He does have a heavier winter jacket that he will wear, but it doesn't have a hood. So we'll look for something else.
customer_reviews.author: L. Friedman

customer_reviews.title: Cheap material
customer_reviews.text: The coat initially looked great and fit our BMD( not an easy task). The problem with it is the quality of the material used. Yes, it’s waterproof and lightweight, however it tore on a seam the maiden voyage. This coat will not serve its purpose with a hole due to manufacturing defects. I considered ordering another hoping it was a “one of” issue, but ultimately decided against being fooled twice. Hopefully all the people that gave it positive reviews are still happy.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: 16lb dachsund - medium fit perfect
customer_reviews.text: I liked this raincoat! very cute & light weight. I wanted something to for the rain so this works. The only issue I would say is it doesn't come down far enough on her belly but that can easiliy be fixed by putting a sweater underneath but then again, the sweater isn't water proof missing the point of keeping her belly dry. Sill a good product though.
customer_reviews.author: CTB

customer_reviews.title: Sizeing could be a little better.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this for my dog but he seems to be between the medium and the large. Purchased the large based on his length but it almost dragged on the ground so I then bought the medium and it barely allowed enough room to fasten in the front. Am making do with the medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Received just as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Easy to adjust with the velcro straps. Good for rainy days. Lightweight. The back of it is a bit frilly kind of.....the way it flares out, but that may be more so since my min pin is a slim/lean dog and so anything would flare out on him. Wearing it does not hinder or get in the way of playing or running. Getting the harness leash connected through opening was easy to do, as well. Happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Marquis

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. Wish I would have gotten it a bit smaller but I will fix it. My dog is a husky 45 lbs. I thought I’d get it bigger so it can cover him more. It does cover him more but it moves to the side and the front it’s too long so when he’s smelling he trips on it. Good quality for price though
customer_reviews.author: PEMQ

customer_reviews.title: Poorly designed
customer_reviews.text: This raincoat is too short and the belly band is so far back it interferes with the movement of my dog's back legs. Also, the "hat" portion doesn't stay up. Sorry, but she just hates this coat.
customer_reviews.author: S Stone

customer_reviews.title: Corgi not as impressed as I am.
customer_reviews.text: I bought a large for my corgi. It’s somewhat large through the belly but snug through the shoulders. The hood doesn’t quite accommodate the sheer fabulousness of her corgi ears when they are up but when she goes full on seal (ears back) it goes over her eyes and she can’t see. Folding the hood in half to the inside seems to help a lot. All in all, I’m happy with this purchase, although the more I make her wear this, the more I sleep with one eye open. But it sure looks cute on her. And coming indoors after walking in the rain, there is a lot less wet dog to towel off.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Quintana

customer_reviews.title: Decent quality
customer_reviews.text: Good raincoat for our dog. We like the reflector. No loose stitching, decent quality. Only 4-stars because it does runs a little small like others have said. Our dog's length from the neck to tail is 17 inches. We got the medium because it stated it was for dogs 14-19 inches long but it runs small (see pics). The hood fits snug. Overall, not too bad. We'll see how long this will last.
customer_reviews.author: 1eyed 1der

customer_reviews.title: It's a rain coat but the hood should have been left off
customer_reviews.text: My dog doesn't care for the hood over her head. I have to leave it back. Otherwise, it is a raincoat. I only put it on her if it is a day where the rain isn't going to stop and is quite heavy. This year has been really wet so it gives me one other than her lambs wool coat to use. Fastens with Velcro.
customer_reviews.author: AR Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Cute, but short length & no belly coverage
customer_reviews.text: Very cute and sturdy, especially for the price. However, as others have noted, the length in particular seems to be off/run short. I got a small for my chihuahua-papillon mix and it was way too short. The band around the belly fit him well, but is also too small width-wise to get any belly coverage. As a result, only about the top half of his back stayed dry after just a quick walk in drizzling rain.
customer_reviews.author: Hailey L.

customer_reviews.title: Best Raincoat Ever ... Easy on, Easy Off.
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased this same raincoat for 3 dogs now. It's a great coat because it fits very well, but the most helpful thing is that it is EASY ON AND EASY OFF. I love, love that about this coat. First, the dog is fidgety and wants to go out NOW. This coat is on in seconds flat and the dog is out the door. I also purchased another for a friend with an Austrailian Cattle Dog, and when they get wet, they're pretty smelly. So far, Honey loves going for walks in the rain, staying high and dry.
customer_reviews.author: Cookie

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful little raincoat!
customer_reviews.text: I love this raincoat. My little guy is only 9 lbs, but his girth is like an Italian greyhound (wide) and he stretches out looong. So I believe after I measured, I got him a medium size. (I also put a warm sweater on him under it.) Do not hesitate, but measure!!
customer_reviews.author: SMD

customer_reviews.title: Quality well made fitting Doggy Raincoat👍🏼
customer_reviews.text: 💕 Love this Doggy Raincoat! Quality material and smooth to the touch. Medium fits a Shih Tzu 15 pds for my taste but some may prefer size smaller. Hood I Liked folded back little. I recommend this coat! Delivery in only 2 days! Way to go Amazon Delivery service👍🏼🥰
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality, bad customer service. Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality. Do not purchase. I bought three sizes at once to make sure I got the right size. We settled on XL for my long and lean 55lb lab mix. On our second walk and the hood ripped and not on a seam so it’s not easy to repair. Have to throw out and buy another raincoat from another manufacturer. I tried reaching out the company several times and no one got back to me. Very poor customer service.
customer_reviews.author: KW

product_meta.title: Fashion Pet Dog Raincoat For Small Dogs | Dog Rain Jacket With Hood | Dog Rain Poncho | 100% Polyester | Water Proof | Yellow w/ Grey Reflective Stripe | Perfect Rain Gear For Your Pet! by Ethical Pet
product_meta.description:
Size:MediumProtect your dog from cold and rainy weather with a full coverage comfortable raincoat. 
Whether you're a dog owner, a pet sitter or a dog lover, its important to keep your fluffy friends safe and warm while outdoors; especially when its rainy, cold or snowy. Safety meets functionality
We created SPOT dog raincoats to protect your pup in the rain, the snow, and for any other time your dog may need outdoor protection. Designed comfortably in a vibrant yellow color with safety reflective stripes and a full coverage hood, our raincoat allows your dog to enjoy being outdoors regardless of the weather conditions. So grab your ball and go play fetch; we'll protect your dog so you can focus on giving your dog some much needed fun and his/her daily dose of exercise. Product details:
Bright yellow with grey reflective stripes Lightweight, soft, comfortable and warm Waterproof Coat that is easy to clean Leash hole on back Adjustable velcro belly and chest straps to make the fit just right Full coverage hood 100% Money back guarantee Whether you call it a rain coat, rain jacket, rain poncho or slicker. Whether your dog is big or small, a Maltese, pitbull, bulldog, dachshund, doberman, yorkie, german shepherd, greyhound, golden retriever, labrador, chihuahua or any other breed, there is a size for you. So rainproof your outdoor excursions, today and never let the cold weather keep your dog from playtime and walks again. Don't forget your umbrella for yourself.
feature_bullets: STYLISH, COMFORTABLE AND DRY: Look good. Feel good. Stay active. We've designed a coat that will achieve all your fashion needs while maintaining optimal functionality. This poncho features a vibrant yellow color with a sporty full coverage hood. Made from 100% polyester waterproof fabric, so your dog will remain dry and warm in all climates. Leash holes have been designed into the coat for comfort during walks.

ENJOY IN EASE: We at SPOT created this dog coat with YOU in mind. For ease of use, velcro fastenings have been placed on both the chest and belly closings. The lightweight fabric makes putting on and taking off the coat convenient and simple. The poncho is washable and can easily be stored away or packed in your luggage for your next vacation.

PERFECT FIT: Easily Adjustable Velcro belly and chest straps for a comfortable and snug fit. The raincoats are available in sizes; XS, Small, Medium, Large, XL, XXL. For most accurate fitting and sizing we highly recommend using our size chart below . Our image and chart gives clear instructions on how to properly measure your dog and will then dictate which size your pup needs.

SAFETY FIRST: Highly Visible Bright Yellow w/ Reflective Stripes - Designed to maximize the safety of your dog while outdoors during inclement weather. The bright yellow color and reflective stripes are on both the back and hood to provide optimal visibility in rain, snow or shine. As pet parents, we pride ourselves in the creation if high quality, safe and fun dog products.
100% WORRY FREE GUARANTEE: We work hard to create the safest and best dog raincoat on the market, which is why we're confident in offering a worry free guarantee for satisfaction.

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
